topics.body:
One of the best Jojo protagonists is Josuke Higashikata. (The Hero of Diamond is unbreakable)

There was this one bit where he found out that the user of the Stand Highway star (That was just attacking the heroes) was bed ridden. So Josuke heals him with Crazy diamond, And After the guy celebrates for a bit, He's like "The way I see it, If I heal you, *Then* Beat you up, Then I won't be "bullying the weak", *Now will I?*"
